txt.en: Defeat many Spawns of Angband in Skirmishes.\nThis deed will only be advanced by Lieutenants that do not appear grey to your character, they must be around the same level as you are.
Defeat many Spawns of Angband in Skirmishes
It is said that all of Dragon-kind can trace its roots the the Black Pits of Angband...if these are lesser descendants of those great beasts, you do not want to meet their ancestors.
